Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION
REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION

Title: Requires merchants to round cash purchases to the nearest five cent denomination in order to reduce the circulation of pennies within New York state
Summary: Requires merchants to round cash purchases to the nearest five cent denomination in order to encourage the reduction of the circulation of pennies within New York state.
LawCode: Add ยง399-ooo, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to requiring merchants to round cash purchases to the nearest five cent denomination in order to reduce the circulation of pennies within New York state
